title: How Does tDarts Work? - FAQ
subtitle: Complete guide to using the tDarts platform. Registration, club management, starting tournaments, score logging and league management step by step.

sections.content: Using the tDarts platform is simple and intuitive. Below we present step by step how to register, log in, manage your club, and how to start or participate in tournaments.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Join the tDarts community and start your first tournament today!
